---


현재 UI 구조를 확인했습니다. 어떤 부분을 개선할까요? 예:

1. **인사말 화면** (`Greeting`) — 더 현대적이고 매력적으로
2. **색상 테마** — 더 밝고 생동감 있는 색상
3. **레이아웃/간격** — 더 넓은 여백과 간격
4. **애니메이션** — 더 부드러운 전환
5. **채팅 인터페이스** — 메시지 스타일, 입력창 디자인

원하는 항목을 알려주시면 진행하겠습니다. 원하시면 전체적인 현대화도 가능합니다.

---


v0.app 스타일로 맞추기 위해 변경할 주요 부분:

1. **인사말 화면 (Greeting)** - "What do you want to create?" 스타일
2. **입력 필드** - 더 크고 중앙 배치, "Ask v0 to build..." 플레이스홀더
3. **레이아웃** - 메시지가 없을 때 입력 필드를 중앙에 배치
4. **색상/스타일** - 미니멀한 디자인

변경 사항:

## 1. Greeting 컴포넌트 업데이트

```1:29:components/greeting.tsx
import { motion } from "framer-motion";

export const Greeting = () => {
  return (
    <div
      className="mx-auto mt-4 flex size-full max-w-3xl flex-col justify-center px-4 md:mt-16 md:px-8"
      key="overview"
    >
      <motion.div
        animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        className="font-semibold text-xl md:text-2xl"
        exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        transition={{ delay: 0.5 }}
      >
        Hello there!
      </motion.div>
      <motion.div
        animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        className="text-xl text-zinc-500 md:text-2xl"
        exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        transition={{ delay: 0.6 }}
      >
        How can I help you today?
      </motion.div>
    </div>
  );
};
```

다음과 같이 변경:

```tsx:components/greeting.tsx
import { motion } from "framer-motion";

export const Greeting = () => {
  return (
    <motion.div
      animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
      className="mx-auto flex w-full max-w-4xl flex-col items-center justify-center px-4 py-16 md:px-8"
      exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
      key="overview"
      transition={{ delay: 0.2 }}
    >
      <motion.h1
        animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
        className="mb-8 text-center font-semibold text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl"
        exit={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }}
        transition={{ delay: 0.3 }}
      >
        What do you want to create?
      </motion.h1>
    </motion.div>
  );
};
```

## 2. Chat 컴포넌트 레이아웃 조정

메시지가 없을 때 입력 필드를 중앙에 배치하도록 변경:

```157:198:components/chat.tsx
      <div className="overscroll-behavior-contain flex h-dvh min-w-0 touch-pan-y flex-col bg-background">
        <ChatHeader
          chatId={id}
          isReadonly={isReadonly}
          selectedVisibilityType={initialVisibilityType}
        />

        <Messages
          chatId={id}
          isArtifactVisible={isArtifactVisible}
          isReadonly={isReadonly}
          messages={messages}
          regenerate={regenerate}
          selectedModelId={initialChatModel}
          setMessages={setMessages}
          status={status}
          votes={votes}
        />

        <div className="sticky bottom-0 z-1 mx-auto flex w-full max-w-4xl gap-2 border-t-0 bg-background px-2 pb-3 md:px-4 md:pb-4">
          {!isReadonly && (
            <MultimodalInput
              attachments={attachments}
              chatId={id}
              input={input}
              messages={messages}
              onModelChange={setCurrentModelId}
              selectedModelId={currentModelId}
              selectedVisibilityType={visibilityType}
              sendMessage={sendMessage}
              setAttachments={setAttachments}
              setInput={setInput}
              setMessages={setMessages}
              status={status}
              stop={stop}
              usage={usage}
            />
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
```

다음과 같이 변경:

```tsx:components/chat.tsx
// ... existing code ...

      <div className="overscroll-behavior-contain flex h-dvh min-w-0 touch-pan-y flex-col bg-background">
        <ChatHeader
          chatId={id}
          isReadonly={isReadonly}
          selectedVisibilityType={initialVisibilityType}
        />

        {messages.length === 0 ? (
          <div className="flex flex-1 flex-col">
            <Messages
              chatId={id}
              isArtifactVisible={isArtifactVisible}
              isReadonly={isReadonly}
              messages={messages}
              regenerate={regenerate}
              selectedModelId={initialChatModel}
              setMessages={setMessages}
              status={status}
              votes={votes}
            />
            <div className="mx-auto flex w-full max-w-3xl flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 px-4 pb-8">
              {!isReadonly && (
                <MultimodalInput
                  attachments={attachments}
                  chatId={id}
                  className="w-full"
                  input={input}
                  messages={messages}
                  onModelChange={setCurrentModelId}
                  selectedModelId={currentModelId}
                  selectedVisibilityType={visibilityType}
                  sendMessage={sendMessage}
                  setAttachments={setAttachments}
                  setInput={setInput}
                  setMessages={setMessages}
                  status={status}
                  stop={stop}
                  usage={usage}
                />
              )}
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <>
            <Messages
              chatId={id}
              isArtifactVisible={isArtifactVisible}
              isReadonly={isReadonly}
              messages={messages}
              regenerate={regenerate}
              selectedModelId={initialChatModel}
              setMessages={setMessages}
              status={status}
              votes={votes}
            />

            <div className="sticky bottom-0 z-1 mx-auto flex w-full max-w-4xl gap-2 border-t-0 bg-background px-2 pb-3 md:px-4 md:pb-4">
              {!isReadonly && (
                <MultimodalInput
                  attachments={attachments}
                  chatId={id}
                  input={input}
                  messages={messages}
                  onModelChange={setCurrentModelId}
                  selectedModelId={currentModelId}
                  selectedVisibilityType={visibilityType}
                  sendMessage={sendMessage}
                  setAttachments={setAttachments}
                  setInput={setInput}
                  setMessages={setMessages}
                  status={status}
                  stop={stop}
                  usage={usage}
                />
              )}
            </div>
          </>
        )}
      </div>

// ... existing code ...
```

## 3. MultimodalInput 스타일 업데이트

입력 필드를 v0.app 스타일로 변경:

```289:398:components/multimodal-input.tsx
  return (
    <div className={cn("relative flex w-full flex-col gap-4", className)}>
      {messages.length === 0 &&
        attachments.length === 0 &&
        uploadQueue.length === 0 && (
          <SuggestedActions
            chatId={chatId}
            selectedVisibilityType={selectedVisibilityType}
            sendMessage={sendMessage}
          />
        )}

      <input
        className="-top-4 -left-4 pointer-events-none fixed size-0.5 opacity-0"
        multiple
        onChange={handleFileChange}
        ref={fileInputRef}
        tabIndex={-1}
        type="file"
      />

      <PromptInput
        className="rounded-xl border border-border bg-background p-3 shadow-xs transition-all duration-200 focus-within:border-border hover:border-muted-foreground/50"
        onSubmit={(event) => {
          event.preventDefault();
          if (status !== "ready") {
            toast.error("Please wait for the model to finish its response!");
          } else {
            submitForm();
          }
        }}
      >
        {(attachments.length > 0 || uploadQueue.length > 0) && (
          <div
            className="flex flex-row items-end gap-2 overflow-x-scroll"
            data-testid="attachments-preview"
          >
            {attachments.map((attachment) => (
              <PreviewAttachment
                attachment={attachment}
                key={attachment.url}
                onRemove={() => {
                  setAttachments((currentAttachments) =>
                    currentAttachments.filter((a) => a.url !== attachment.url)
                  );
                  if (fileInputRef.current) {
                    fileInputRef.current.value = "";
                  }
                }}
              />
            ))}

            {uploadQueue.map((filename) => (
              <PreviewAttachment
                attachment={{
                  url: "",
                  name: filename,
                  contentType: "",
                }}
                isUploading={true}
                key={filename}
              />
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
        <div className="flex flex-row items-start gap-1 sm:gap-2">
          <PromptInputTextarea
            autoFocus
            className="grow resize-none border-0! border-none! bg-transparent p-2 text-sm outline-none ring-0 [-ms-overflow-style:none] [scrollbar-width:none] placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-0 focus-visible:ring-offset-0 [&::-webkit-scrollbar]:hidden"
            data-testid="multimodal-input"
            disableAutoResize={true}
            maxHeight={200}
            minHeight={44}
            onChange={handleInput}
            placeholder="Send a message..."
            ref={textareaRef}
            rows={1}
            value={input}
          />{" "}
          <Context {...contextProps} />
        </div>
        <PromptInputToolbar className="!border-top-0 border-t-0! p-0 shadow-none dark:border-0 dark:border-transparent!">
          <PromptInputTools className="gap-0 sm:gap-0.5">
            <AttachmentsButton
              fileInputRef={fileInputRef}
              selectedModelId={selectedModelId}
              status={status}
            />
            <ModelSelectorCompact
              onModelChange={onModelChange}
              selectedModelId={selectedModelId}
            />
          </PromptInputTools>

          {status === "submitted" ? (
            <StopButton setMessages={setMessages} stop={stop} />
          ) : (
            <PromptInputSubmit
              className="size-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground transition-colors duration-200 hover:bg-primary/90 disabled:bg-muted disabled:text-muted-foreground"
              data-testid="send-button"
              disabled={!input.trim() || uploadQueue.length > 0}
              status={status}
            >
              <ArrowUpIcon size={14} />
            </PromptInputSubmit>
          )}
        </PromptInputToolbar>
      </PromptInput>
    </div>
  );
```

다음과 같이 변경:

```tsx:components/multimodal-input.tsx
  const isEmptyState = messages.length === 0;

  return (
    <div className={cn("relative flex w-full flex-col gap-4", className)}>
      {isEmptyState &&
        attachments.length === 0 &&
        uploadQueue.length === 0 && (
          <SuggestedActions
            chatId={chatId}
            selectedVisibilityType={selectedVisibilityType}
            sendMessage={sendMessage}
          />
        )}

      <input
        className="-top-4 -left-4 pointer-events-none fixed size-0.5 opacity-0"
        multiple
        onChange={handleFileChange}
        ref={fileInputRef}
        tabIndex={-1}
        type="file"
      />

      <PromptInput
        className={cn(
          "border border-border bg-background transition-all duration-200 focus-within:border-border hover:border-muted-foreground/50",
          isEmptyState
            ? "rounded-2xl p-4 shadow-lg"
            : "rounded-xl p-3 shadow-xs"
        )}
        onSubmit={(event) => {
          event.preventDefault();
          if (status !== "ready") {
            toast.error("Please wait for the model to finish its response!");
          } else {
            submitForm();
          }
        }}
      >
        {(attachments.length > 0 || uploadQueue.length > 0) && (
          <div
            className="flex flex-row items-end gap-2 overflow-x-scroll"
            data-testid="attachments-preview"
          >
            {attachments.map((attachment) => (
              <PreviewAttachment
                attachment={attachment}
                key={attachment.url}
                onRemove={() => {
                  setAttachments((currentAttachments) =>
                    currentAttachments.filter((a) => a.url !== attachment.url)
                  );
                  if (fileInputRef.current) {
                    fileInputRef.current.value = "";
                  }
                }}
              />
            ))}

            {uploadQueue.map((filename) => (
              <PreviewAttachment
                attachment={{
                  url: "",
                  name: filename,
                  contentType: "",
                }}
                isUploading={true}
                key={filename}
              />
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
        <div className="flex flex-row items-start gap-1 sm:gap-2">
          <PromptInputTextarea
            autoFocus
            className={cn(
              "grow resize-none border-0! border-none! bg-transparent outline-none ring-0 [-ms-overflow-style:none] [scrollbar-width:none] placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-0 focus-visible:ring-offset-0 [&::-webkit-scrollbar]:hidden",
              isEmptyState ? "p-3 text-base" : "p-2 text-sm"
            )}
            data-testid="multimodal-input"
            disableAutoResize={true}
            maxHeight={200}
            minHeight={isEmptyState ? 56 : 44}
            onChange={handleInput}
            placeholder={isEmptyState ? "Ask v0 to build..." : "Send a message..."}
            ref={textareaRef}
            rows={1}
            value={input}
          />
          <Context {...contextProps} />
        </div>
        <PromptInputToolbar className="!border-top-0 border-t-0! p-0 shadow-none dark:border-0 dark:border-transparent!">
          <PromptInputTools className="gap-0 sm:gap-0.5">
            <AttachmentsButton
              fileInputRef={fileInputRef}
              selectedModelId={selectedModelId}
              status={status}
            />
            <ModelSelectorCompact
              onModelChange={onModelChange}
              selectedModelId={selectedModelId}
            />
          </PromptInputTools>

          {status === "submitted" ? (
            <StopButton setMessages={setMessages} stop={stop} />
          ) : (
            <PromptInputSubmit
              className="size-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground transition-colors duration-200 hover:bg-primary/90 disabled:bg-muted disabled:text-muted-foreground"
              data-testid="send-button"
              disabled={!input.trim() || uploadQueue.length > 0}
              status={status}
            >
              <ArrowUpIcon size={14} />
            </PromptInputSubmit>
          )}
        </PromptInputToolbar>
      </PromptInput>
    </div>
  );
```

## 4. Messages 컴포넌트 조정

메시지가 없을 때 Greeting만 표시되도록:

```46:52:components/messages.tsx
      <div className="mx-auto flex min-w-0 max-w-4xl flex-col gap-4 px-2 py-4 md:gap-6 md:px-4">
        {messages.length === 0 && <Greeting />}

        {messages.map((message, index) => (
```

변경 없음 (이미 올바름).

---

요약:
- Greeting을 "What do you want to create?" 스타일로 변경
- 메시지가 없을 때 입력 필드를 중앙에 배치
- 입력 필드 스타일을 v0.app처럼 크게 조정
- 플레이스홀더를 "Ask v0 to build..."로 변경

이 변경사항을 적용할까요? 추가로 조정할 부분이 있으면 알려주세요.

---

_**User (2025-11-29 13:49Z)**_

일단, 현재까지 작업한 걸



https://github.com/KevinFire2030/PossibleConnect 



에



n8n 브랜치를 하나 만들어서



모두 푸쉬해 줄수 있을까?



---

_**Agent (model default, mode Ask)**_



---


ask mode에서는 Git 작업을 직접 실행할 수 없습니다. 아래 명령어를 터미널에서 실행하세요.

## Git 브랜치 생성 및 푸시 명령어

현재 작업 디렉토리에서 다음 명령어를 순서대로 실행하세요:

```bash
# 1. 현재 변경사항 확인
git status

# 2. 변경사항이 있다면 스테이징
git add .

# 3. 커밋 (변경사항이 있다면)
git commit -m "Add n8n provider integration and UI updates"

# 4. n8n 브랜치 생성 및 체크아웃
git checkout -b n8n

# 5. 원격 저장소 확인 (이미 연결되어 있는지 확인)
git remote -v

# 6. 원격 저장소가 없다면 추가
# git remote add origin https://github.com/KevinFire2030/PossibleConnect.git

# 7. n8n 브랜치를 원격 저장소에 푸시
git push -u origin n8n
```

## 주의사항

1. 원격 저장소가 이미 설정되어 있는지 확인:
   ```bash
   git remote -v
   ```
   - 출력이 없다면 `git remote add origin https://github.com/KevinFire2030/PossibleConnect.git` 실행

2. 현재 브랜치 확인:
   ```bash
   git branch
   ```

3. 커밋 전 변경사항 확인:
   ```bash
   git status
   git diff
   ```

## Agent Mode로 전환

자동으로 실행하려면 Agent Mode로 전환하세요. 그러면 위 명령어를 자동으로 실행할 수 있습니다.

문제가 있으면 알려주세요.

---
